item2: Item 2. Management’s Discussion Analysis Financial Condition Results Operations , Financial Statements related Notes appear elsewhere document. Quarterly Financial Highlights Revenue $3,173 million, down 2.4% year-on-year; GAAP gross margin 56.3%, GAAP operating margin 28.1%; Non-GAAP gross margin 57.0%, non-GAAP operating margin 33.8%; Cash flow operations $585 million, net capital expenditures property, plant equipment $76 million, resulting non-GAAP free cash flow $509 million; During third quarter 2025, NXP returned capital shareholders payment $256 million cash dividends repurchase $54 million its common shares, total capital return $310 million.
